National_City.Lambda Archives of San Diego:
Lambda Archives of San Diego is a collection of LGBT historical materials in San Diego, California, United States.
Jess Jessop incorporated the Lesbian and Gay Archives of San Diego in 1987, starting the collection with materials that he and Doug Moore had gathered. Lambda Archives’ primary focus is Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual, and Transgender (LGBT) history and culture in the San Diego County, Tijuana (Baja California, Mexico) Region.
